description: Crewe's League Two play-off hopes suffer a setback as they're thrashed by Fleetwood.
title: Crewe Alexandra 1-4 Fleetwood Town
title_page: League Two: Crewe Alexandra 1-4 Fleetwood Town - BBC Sport
maintext:
After winning the reverse fixture in October, Crewe Alexandra will be looking to record a first ever Football League double over Fleetwood Town.
Fleetwood last visited Crewe in the league in April 2022 in League One, winning 3-1 â€“ they had failed to win each of their first three Football League away games at Crewe beforehand (D2 L1).
Although Crewe have only lost two of their last 15 home league games (W8 D5), both of those have come in their last four (W1 D1).
Fleetwood are unbeaten in their last six league games played on a Tuesday (W3 D3), although their last defeat on this day of the week was the reverse meeting with Crewe in October (0-1).
